Ungade here kukanzura ikozvino VPN Connection? EHE AIHWA Ehe Aihwa Sarudza Mifananidzo Tabs Share Sevha More OK Kanzura Chinja iyo webhusaiti iyo inozara pa
kutanga kweBhurawuza Wedzera tsika yekutsvaga url zvakare sarudza "Custom\search engine" semupi wekutsvaga Sarudza injini yekutsvaga yaunofarira kana\seta yaunoda Bvisa dhata rebrowser yako kana sarudza kuti ndeipi data\inozocheneswa kana wasiya app Sarudza kuti ndezvipi zvikamu zvebrowser\zvichatanga Chinja maitiro uye ui yeapp kuti
 ienderane nezvaunoda Kuti uratidze dialog yekusefa, dzvanya pabhukimaki icon mupfupi. Sarudza kuti ndeapi masefa auchashandisa Zvigadziriso zvebrowser, ipapo paunogona zvinoenderana ne\ yako Android vhezheni ipa mvumo. Vhura mifananidzo yeNetiweki, Kudzima kunogona kubatsira\kuchengeta nharembozha uye kurodha webhusaiti nekukurumidza Bvumira mawebhusaiti kuwana nzvimbo yako. Mamwe
mawebhusaiti {google, mamepu e nav) anoda izvi zvinogoneka Sevha nhoroondo yemawebhusaiti akashanyirwa Vhura JavaScript. Mawebhusaiti mazhinji anoda
JavaScript yekushanda kwawo. Asi iwo \ zvakare kuzorora uye anogona kushandiswa kurwisa Gonesa Cookies. Makuki madiki mameseji mafaira, izvo zvakachengetwa pamudziyo wako. Mawebhusaiti anoshandisa iwo semuenzaniso kuchengetedza mushandisi marongero. Asi ivo vaigona zvakare kushandiswa kuunganidza mushandisi wega data. Wechitatu makuki anogara akavharwa. Nhaurirano yekusimbisa kana\kuvhara browser Nhaurirano yekusimbisa kana uchivhara tab Vhurazve tebhu nyowani kana tebhu yekupedzisira yakavharwa pane kubuda mubrowser Shandisa iyo skrini yese paunenge uchipuruzira webhusaiti kana ukadzvanya bhatani rekumashure iwe unosiya yakazara skrini modhi Images Vadivelu Comedy Videos Web Browser Mufananidzo Slider Next Previous Help Settings Mitauro More Apps Rate Us Screen Mirroring Ita shuwa kuti foni yako neTV zvakabatana kune imwecheteyo Wi-Fi network. Wi-Fi Yakabatanidzwa Wi-Fi Yadzimwa General Kurukurai Send Feedback Tutorial Kushandisa sei? Kutenderera Kutenderera Hunhu Auto Stop Auto Minimize Advance Oriental Mode Misa vhidhiyo kana chinongedzo\pachinangwa charasika Viga app kana mirroring inotanga Casting orientation Mirroring mode Screen mirroring zvakavanzika mutemo Privacy Policy Zvishandiso zvinotsigira Ona kuti ndezvipi zvishandiso zvinotsigira mirroring Color Theme Rima Chiedza Auto Sarudza Mutauro pedyo Mifananidzo Slider Screen Mirror Chishandiso chako chaunonongedza chinofanira kunge chiri mune imwecheteyo Wi-Fi network semudziyo uyu, nekuti Screen Mirror iri kufambisa skrini yako. Simbisa chidzitiro chemudziyo wako paWi-Fi kune komputa yako, kabhuku kana piritsi. Iwe unogona zvakare kushandisa hotspot yemudziyo wako (tethering mode) uye batanidza mudziyo wako waunonongedza kune yako hotspot. Vhura saiti pane chako chipfuro. Nekutarisa iyo QR kodhi iyo yekubatanidza kumisikidzwa inofambiswa uye girazi rinotanga. Ndokumbira uzive kuti Screen Mirror inoshanda chete kana yakagadzika nemazvo. Screen Mirror fambisa skrini yako, asi kwete masaini emudziyo wako. Kana wasangana nematambudziko taura nesu. Nakidzwa nekutepfenyura uye zvemhando yepamusoro
pasina kunonoka Batanidza nechero mudziyo wakangwara uye unakirwe ne
show pane chero sikirini Nakidzwa ne-in-app yakavanzika browser pasina zvipingamupinyi Screen Setup Device 's Hotspot Scan Code Support Finish Yedu Policies Kukudzivirira kuvanzika kwakakosha kwatiri. Tinovimba kuti chirevo chinotevera chichakubatsira kuti unzwisise mabatiro atinoita ruzivo rwemunhu, rwaunogona kutipa nguva nenguva uchishandisa Internet (Google Play platform).

Kazhinji. isu hatitore chero PII kubva kwauri paunodhawunirodha yedu Android application. Kutaura chokwadi, hatidi kuti vatengi vashanyire application yedu, isu hatina kana Server yekuchengeta PII yakadaro.

Screen Mirroring inoshandisa Facebook sevanopa ads. Facebook inoda kuratidza ads anoenderana newe. Kuti uwane rumwe ruzivo ndapota shanya
https://m.facebook.com/ads/ad_choices.

Mamiriro ega atingangokwanisa kuwana kwauri PII kana iwe pachako wafunga kutitumira email mhinduro yako kana kutipa chikiribidi. report. MaPII atingatore kubva kwauri mumamiriro ezvinhu akadaro anongogumira kune zita rako, kero yeemail nemhinduro yako paongororo chete.

Nezviri pamusoro apa, tinovimbisa kuti iwe PII uchashandiswa chete kubata iwe nekuvandudza masevhisi edu. Hatife takashandisa ruzivo rwakadaro (semuzita rako nekero yeemail_ kune chero chinangwa, sekuenderera mberi nekutengesa zvigadzirwa zvedu, kana kuzivisa ruzivo rwako kune wechitatu bato kuti uwane bhizinesi.

Zvinofanira kucherechedzwa kuti kana kusatitumira mhinduro yako kana rondedzero yebug idanho rekuzvidira pane yako pachako sarudzo.Kana uine hanya nezvePII yako iri kushandiswa zvisizvo, kana iwe uchida rumwe ruzivo nezve yedu zvakavanzika mutemo uye zvazvinoreva, ndapota inzwa wakasununguka kutitumira email. pa screenmirroring.feedback@gmail.com, tichaedza kupa mhinduro dzakajeka kumibvunzo yako nenguva. Ndapota nyora mhinduro yako Yako System Info inotumirwa kuScreen Mirroring tech Dhipatimendi Send ipa mhinduro Imeyili isiriyo yapihwa Tarisa Indaneti yako type apa… Isa email yako (optional) Kunakidzwa neApp? Ongorora zvaunoita uchishandisa Screen
Mirroring App. Kwete izvozvi Mhinduro: Muenzaniso: Brand: OS Version: Mugadziri: RAM: Tumira tsamba Sarudza Mufananidzo Help Center Foni yangu inonamira pa "Kubatanidza" kana ichibatanidza neTV. Zvakandiitira kare, asi 
hazvishande iye zvino. Zvinoratidza kuti mudziyo 
wangu hautsigirwe. TV yangu ndeyekare TV uye 
haitsigire wi-fi. Mufananidzo uri paTV wakasviba, 
asi ruzha runogona kunzwika. Kubatana kunozokanganiswa mushure 
mechinguva. Ko ruzivo rwangu rwemunhu kana nharembozha yakachengeteka zvachose? Tangazve iyo smart phone's Wi-Fi uye ona kana kubatana kwacho kwabudirira. Dzima TV uye bvisa tambo yayo yemagetsi kubva pane socket zvakare. Mirira miniti imwe uye wotangazve TV. Pfupisa chinhambwe pakati pefoni yako neTV. Iswededze pedyo. Kana yakamboshanda, saka inogona kushandiswa zvakare. Mazhinji matambudziko ekubatanidza anogona kugadziriswa nekutangazve zvishandiso. Ingo tangazve zvese foni yako neTV, tevera yakajairika yekubatanidza maitiro kuti uedze zvakare. Izvi zvinoreva kuti foni yako pachayo haitsigire chidzitiro mirroring basa. Unogona kushandisa XCast kukanda vhidhiyo, odhiyo uye mufananidzo kuTV. Ne XCast, unogona kuita zvimwe zvinhu nefoni yako uchikanda kuTV. Kana TV yako ichitsigira HDMI interface, tinokurudzira kuti utenge yekunze inogamuchira yescreen mirroring. Zvakadai seChromecast, Anycast nezvimwe. Zvimwe zvemukati zvinosanganisira kuchengetedzwa kwekodzero uye hazvigone kuratidzwa pamidziyo yechitatu, seNetflix, Disney Plus nezvimwe. Unogona kudhawunirodha vhidhiyo kana kutsvaga imwe sosi pane mamwe maapplication kuti uedze. Unogona kubatidza Smart Connect mune yako Wi-Fi marongero. Ichatsvaga zvirinani Wi-fi yekubatanidza nguva dzose, uye inogara ichibatanidza nekudzoka. Ndapota ita shuwa kuti Wi-Fi yefoni mbozha neTV ndiyo SAM uye chiratidzo chakanakisa. Isu hatitarise kana kuunganidza chero ruzivo pauri uye nenharembozha yako. Unogona kukanda skrini yako pasina kunetsekana. Iyo sisitimu inogona kukuyambira kuti kune njodzi yekuchengetedza isati yasvika skrini yegirazi. Ichi chingori chiyeuchidzo chenguva dzose, chichava WI-FI CHISHAmiso INSTALL Install Manual Ita shuwa kuti foni yako neTV zvakabatana
etiweki yeWi-Fi imwechete.
